thread.title: Alabama among 24 states to challenge EPA's Clean Power Plan
thread.title_full: Alabama among 24 states to challenge EPA's Clean Power Plan

title: Alabama among 24 states to challenge EPA's Clean Power Plan
text:
Published By: Al.com: Montgomery - Today 
Alabama joins 23 other states in challenging the new EPA rule seeking to limit emissions from power plants....
